Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Pistons defeated the Orlando Magic 105-96.
Others: Jaden Ivey scored 22 points before being injured.
Cole Anthony was visibly emotional after the incident.
Detroit guard Ausar Thompson and head coach J.B. Bickerstaff were also affected by the incident.
J.B. Bickerstaff shared his thoughts on the atmosphere in the locker room.
